games.title: Devil Defense
games.description: A turn-based strategy game made for Mini Jam: 110. While in-game you can Sacrifice your team to get stronger.

games.title: Solar System
games.description: An unfinished solar system simulation game with a custom solar system maker (feature in development).

games.title: Solar Smash
games.description: A game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. Features enemy spawning mechanics that increase difficulty, creating lots of replayability!

games.title: Car Vroom
games.description: You are a car trying to get away from the cops! A somewhat finished driving simulation game.
